About Me

Claire Wright is a web developer from Chapel Hill, NC currently living in Athens, GA. She is enrolled in the UNC coding bootcamp and is learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js so far.

Work

portfolio-generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Bootstrap, Node

This project allows the user to create a portfolio from the command line by entering information about themselves and their project. This information is then used to create a website portfolio.
